mapper.insert: insert into t_user (uid, username, password, ulevel, ustatus) values (#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ulevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ustatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select uid, username, password, ulevel, ustatus from t_user

select tu.uid, tui.value as username, tu.password, tu.ulevel, tu.ustatus from t_user tu, t_user_info tui, t_keys tk where tu.username = #{username} and tu.password = #{password} and tu.ustatus = 1 and tk.kname = "name" and tk.kid = tui.kid
select tu.uid, tui.value as username, tu.ulevel, tu.ustatus from t_user tu, t_user_info tui, t_keys tk where tk.kname = "name" and tk.kid = tui.kid and tu.ulevel = 0 limit #{page}, #{limit}
select count(uid) from t_user where ulevel = 1
